text: Into Eternity are a Canadian progressive metal band from Regina, Saskatchewan. Into Eternity was formed in 1997 by band members Tim Roth, Scott Krall and Jim Austin. They released their eponymous debut studio album Into Eternity in 1999. They re-released their debut album when they signed to Century Media Records a year later. Their second album Dead or Dreaming was released in 2001. The album saw the band move more into a progressive and death metal style. Their third studio album Buried in Oblivion was released on February 10, 2004 and their fourth studio album The Scattering of Ashes was released on October 3, 2006. The band then went on tour from 2006 to 2008 and released their fifth studio album The Incurable Tragedy on August 25, 2008. Drummer Bryan Newbury joined the band on March 9, 2011 and Stu Block joined Iced Earth in 2011. Amanda Kiernan joined the band in February 2012.
